ing.item: Dry white wine (chardonnay; sauvignon blanc or riesling)

directions.step:
Chicago Tribune
Preparation time: 10 minutes Yield: 2 1/2 cups
Combine ingredients in non-reactive bowl. Use to marinate 2 pounds of poultry (no longer than 2 hours for boneless breasts), seafood (no longer than an hour; 30 minutes for shrimp), veal or pork (no longer than 4 hours). Variations: Add 1 tablespoon dried oregano and 1 teaspoon lemon zest. Or, for honey-mustard marinade, add 2 tablespoons honey and 3 tablespoons Dijon mustard. Add up to 2 teaspoons chopped fresh herbs such as basil, thyme or rosemary. Posted to TNT - Prodigy's Recipe Exchange Newsletter by Rrairie@aol.com on Aug 27, 1997
